title: Integrated Intuition
description: You know how you’re always trying to be a superhero but you end up hurting yourself somehow?I wrote this book so you can learn how to be psychic without hurting yourself. Take it from me, I didn’t have the happy go lucky awakening experience other people talk about and it got me into some serious trouble. My mad methods will take you from zero to psychic in about eighteen months. It's impossible to go from normal to superhero overnight (they do in movies, but movies aren't real) and it's just not possible for you to go from using ten percent of your brain to twenty percent overnight. Things like that cause spontaneous human combustion, I'm sure you'd rather be psychic than have your head go splat. I’m all about making sure you awaken your mind safely, but I’m also candid as fuck about it.I teach you all the things from meditation to spiritual coaching, astrology, chakras, and weird things you need to know about being psychic. Everything I teach is everything I can do and have done for my clients worldwide.
author: Rhiannon Paille
